name: Parrot And Friends 2
description:
Parrot And Friends 2 is a cute and colorful made with ❤️ Tetris inspired game.

You can choose between three game modes :

  • Classic, the original Tetris gameplay through 20 levels
  • Time, try to beat your highest score in 1mn30
  • Thirty, try to make thirty lines as fast as possible

For each mode, you can choose your starting difficulty level (blocks height and speed level).

Try to beat your highest score by making consecutive or same color lines, by using your full Tetrimino in one drop, and by making combos !
See in-game help for more details.

Use arrow keys to move, rotate and drop.
Press `h` to hold and change Tetrimino.
Press `f` to toggle fullscreen mode
Press `k` to show or hide onscreen controls (for touch devices)
Press `p` to pause game, `m` to toggle music and `s` to toggle sound.

The game supports all resolutions devices and the HTML5 version is playable on all devices including mobiles.

The Mac and Android version are coming very soon !

I hope you will have fun playing this game ! 😊
